Overview

The Legacy Report under the Insights in HackerRank for Work consists of Dashboards and trends to view the activities of the Recruiters and the developers in the form of charts. This article discusses the components of the Legacy report available in HackerRank for Work. 

Legacy Reports

Prerequisites

  • In your HackerRank for an account, You must be logged in as a Company Admin user.

On the home page, click the Insights tab. The Insights Home page displays various analyses in the following categorical sections:

  • Home Page
  • Recruiters
  • Developers 

Home Page

The Home page displays a Dashboard section and a Trends section with charts to display trends in the various activities of Candidate assessments using HackerRank in your company.

The Dashboard section displays an overall view of your company's utilization of HackerRank in terms of the number of Recruiters, Developers, Revenue Savings, Tests, and Interviews. 

The Trends section displays Tests, Interview, Candidate, Recruiter, and Question wise activity trends in your HackerRank company account. A team-wise classification of the above-mentioned trends is also displayed to help you analyze which of your company's recruitment teams are being efficient and effective with conducting Tests and interviews and the Candidates' responses to them.

You can compare these trends on a periodic basis such as daily, weekly, monthly, or specify a time period to view the activities. You can also download the reports by clicking on the download icon on the top right corner of the page.

The Recruiters Page

The Recruiters page displays a dashboard to view your different Recruiters' activities in HackerRank. You can view an overall summary, and their specific activities related to Tests and interviews separately. Select all teams or a specific team to view the HackerRank activities of recruiters in that team. You can also view this data filtered by specific time periods.

Click on the Download CSV icon to download a CSV report of your Recruiters' activities in HackerRank.

The Developers Page

The Developers page displays a dashboard view of your Developers or Technical staff and their activities in HackerRank. You can view their Question wise and interview-wise activities related to Tests and interviews separately. Select all teams or a specific team to view the HackerRank activities of Developers in that team. You can also view this data filtered by specific time periods.

Click on the Download CSV icon to download a CSV report of your Developers' activities.
